article_title: Limited number of Broncos tickets on sale Monday for AFC Divisional Playoff Game
article_text:
DENVER — The Denver Broncos have announced that a limited number of single-game tickets for their AFC Divisional Playoff Game (Sunday, Jan. 17, at 2:40 p.m. MST) at Sports Authority Field at Mile High will go on sale on Monday at 12 p.m. MST.

Tickets will be available at all Ticketmaster locations, by calling 1-800-745-3000 or by visiting www.ticketmaster.com. Tickets will not be available at the Broncos Ticket Office until Tuesday (if there is any inventory remaining).

Please note that tickets will be available only to those with a billing address in the Rocky Mountain region, including Colorado, New Mexico, Utah, Wyoming, Nebraska, Montana, South Dakota and Western Kansas.

Ticket prices range from $80-$230 for reserved seats and $275-$450 for club seats. There is a limit of four (4) tickets per household.
